tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: PointlessBlog Does My Makeup (Badly) | Zoella
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: TURNING ALFIE INTO A GIRL: www.youtube.com Hope you enjoyed watching Alfie create this "masterpiece" on my face. I'm not sure he's of a very high skill in the makeup world, but I think I looked...pretty none the less?! Don't forget to thumbs up if it made you smile and check out the video we did on Alfie's channel where I make him look like a girl :) WHERE TO FIND ALFIE: YOUTUBE : www.youtube.com SECOND CHANNEL : www.youtube.com TWITTER: @PointlessBlogTV INSTAGRAM : @PointlessBlogTv TUMBLR : pointlessblogtv.tumblr.com FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com MOBILE NUMBER: 077...Jokes. haha WHERE TO FIND ME: BLOG : schoee.blogspot.com SHOP (WITH KABUKI BRUSH) : www.shoplouella.com FACEBOOK : www.facebook.com TWITTER : @Zozeebo INSTAGRAM : Zozeebo TUMBLR : zoella.tumblr.com MAKEUP ALFIE USED ON ME: MeMeMe Flawless Cream Foundation "Beige Blush" Mac 168 Brush Nars Sheer Glow Foundation "Santa Fe" Mac 222 Brush Mac Mineralise Skinfinish "So Ceylon" Mac 109 Brush Mac Mineralise Skinfinish "Soft & Gentle" B-Dellium Kabuki (Green available from www.shoplouella.com) HD Brow Kit Nars Eyeshadow Primer Yves Rocher Liquid Liner Stila Convertible Colour "Gladiola" Yves Rocher Sexy Pulp Mascara Dior Eyebrow Pencil (brush end used) Topshop Lipstick "Brighton Rock" Sleek Palette "Ultra Matts V2" Topshop Lipstick "Beguiled" I'M WEARING: Top - New Look Earrings - Random boutique in my town. (sorry that's super unhelpful but just in case anyone was wondering if they could get them)

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
When is Alfie gonna spiff his load all over﻿ yer boobalatoons?
Ity It's s a question everyone wants to know... Please divulge...
biggest friend zone﻿ ive witnessed ever.
Hes in the﻿ friendzone
Tango Whisky Alfa Tango Sierra!﻿
You still look really﻿ pretty without make up, though. :)
Just when are you gonna suck her cock﻿ Alfie???
hes HOT﻿
Zoella looks cute﻿
funniest thing i have ever witnessed.﻿ omg.
cutest﻿ couple everr <3
Lol﻿
I'm sure their is﻿ gay porn less gay than this
And Alfie's number﻿ is where? :p
I wish﻿ my 'scary naked face' looked like that
that's code name (﻿ military code ) for twats , your funny
I hate you﻿ all
Pause At﻿ 4:23 Hes Like Wtf At Her Smile ? :D
help﻿ a sister out and check out my blog- dailygirlupdates.blogspot.com
Woow.. as if you﻿ need makeup! </3 So jealous
OMG HOLD THE HECK﻿ UP. BEFORE ALFIE DID HER EYEBROW'S SHE LOOKED DECENT DIDN'T SHE OMG. Alfie is secretly amazing at makeup omg i'm dying. like if you aggree.
In the﻿ comments some asked Zoe "Are you two just friends?" and she said Yes.... So they're aren't together...
WHAT IF ALFIE AND HER ARE DATING. I DON'T THINK THEY WOULD APPRECIATE PEOPLE SAYING THERE﻿ FRIENDZONING EACH OTHER. OKAY BYE.
Has anyone ever told you you look like (a prettier/darker(haired)/more mysterious looking gwyneth Paltrow in﻿ sliding doors?

Reviewer.Music: Blink-182, Demi Lovato, All Time Low, Never Shout Never,Christina Grimmie, Christina Perri, Jessiej..blah you get ze point?
Reviewer.School: i go to school called :a school
